name: OrangeHRM
description: At OrangeHRM our goal is to help HR do amazing work that they love. HR for All isn’t just a statement at OrangeHRM, it’s a stance that we took when the company was founded in 2006 to help our HR allies make a difference with powerful software tools. OrangeHRM provides a world-class HRIS experience and offers everything you and your team need to be that HR hero you know that you are. Whether you are trying to track PTO or hold performance reviews, you get all of the tools you need to shine. Thousands of businesses around the world are benefitting from OrangeHRM as their HR Management software.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Defining the true meaning of HR for All.
ShortDescription: At OrangeHRM our goal is to help HR do amazing work that they love. HR for All isn’t just a statement at OrangeHRM, it’s a stance that we took when the company was founded in 2006 to help our HR allies make a difference with powerful software tools.
enhanced_description: OrangeHRM, founded in 2006, is a world-class HRIS and Human Capital Management (HCM) solution. Embracing its 'HR for All' philosophy, it provides comprehensive HR management software designed to support HR professionals in core HR administration, performance management, reporting & analytics, and training (LMS). The platform offers tools for tasks like tracking PTO and conducting performance reviews. OrangeHRM aims to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and improve overall employee happiness and engagement. Thousands of businesses globally benefit from OrangeHRM as their HR Management software.
competitive_advantages: Global adoption by thousands of businesses
Commitment to supporting a wide range of HR needs ('HR for All')
roi_benefits: Increased HR efficiency through streamlined administration
Improved employee performance and goal alignment via performance management
Better hiring outcomes and productivity for hiring managers
Data-driven HR decision making through reporting and analytics
